channel.title: Hugo on damauk
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on damauk

item.title: Hugo: Getting Started
item.description: Introduction I have decided that I need to have a new website that is simple, clean, and effective, replacing the slow, out of date WordPress blog I had before. I was thinking I would start writing a pure HTML page then learn some CSS and finally add some javascript, but I quickly realized that beyond being extremely nostalgic, pure HTML websites are a thing of the past and I would be better off starting somewhere else.
